title: Where’s Quinn Simmons? Why One of America’s Top Stars Missed the Tour de France
content:
Former US champion hasn't raced since Strade Bianche. Lidl-Trek officials tell Velo 'there is light at the end of the tunnel' for a Simmons comeback this summer.

Read the full article at Where’s Quinn Simmons? Why One of America’s Top Stars Missed the Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
